'''Osgara Rafendr, Erla of Norwaech''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Though the VTC is of Vailian origin, it's no stranger to foreign investors. The erla of [Norwaech](/norwaech/) knows where the profits are - and is quite friendly towards fellow rulers from the Dyrwood, like the Watcher.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/): Osgara takes part in [Director Castol](/directorCastol/)'s trial.

'''Osgara Rafendr, Erla of Norwaech''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Though the VTC is of Vailian origin, it's no stranger to foreign investors. The erla of [[Norwaech]] knows where the profits are - and is quite friendly towards fellow rulers from the Dyrwood, like the Watcher.
